page.title: 17A Day in Fionnuala's Life
page.content: At 7 a.m. I get up and dress and at 7.30 a.m. I have breakfast and brush my hair. At 8 a.m. I make up my packed lunch for school and watch the news on TV. Later I leave for school and go down the road to collect my friend, Jennifer. This takes five minutes. We walk to school and wait for the bell to ring at 9 a.m. First we have assembly when the minister comes to the school. After assembly we do maths for an hour. Our break lasts for fifteen minutes and then we go back in to have an art lesson. Our lunch break lasts for an hour. We go in at 1.30 p.m. and do language assignments. At 2.35 p.m. we have P.E. and at 3.15 p.m. the bell rings and we all go home. After School I go to Gymnastics Club. At 7 p.m. I have dinner then I watch TV and go to bed at ten o'clock.
